00008 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.IPath;
00009 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor;
00010 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.IStatus;
00011 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.Status;
00012 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.jobs.Job;
00013 import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
00014 import org.eclipse.ui.statushandlers.StatusManager;
00015 import org.osgi.framework.Bundle;
00016 
00017 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.Activator;
00018 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.atl.ATLrunConfiguration;
00019 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.atl.ATLrunner;
00020 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.atl.URInotFound;

00022 
00027 public abstract class TheJob extends Job {
00028 
00029         protected IPath inModelPath;
00030         protected Activator plugin;
00031         protected Bundle pluginBundle;
00032         
00033         protected URI atlSource;
00034         protected URI atlCompiled;
00035         protected URI umlModel;
00036         protected URI simulinkModel;
00037         
00038 
00039         protected TheJob(String name, IPath aPath) {
00040                 super(name);
00041                 this.inModelPath = aPath;
00042                 plugin = Activator.getDefault();
00043                 pluginBundle = plugin.getBundle();
00044 
00045         }
00046 
00047         protected void initJob(String atlSourcePath, String atlCompiledPath) {
00048                 try {
00049                         atlSource       = plugin.locateFile( atlSourcePath );
00050                         atlCompiled = plugin.locateFile( atlCompiledPath );
00051                 } catch (IOException e) {
00052                         plugin.log("Internal error: ATL source not bundled within plugin.", Status.ERROR, e);
00053                         Status status = new Status(IStatus.ERROR, Activator.PLUGIN_ID, "ATL source not found. See Error log for details.");
00054                         StatusManager.getManager().handle(status, StatusManager.SHOW);
00055                 }
00056         }
00057 
00058         /* (non-Javadoc)
00059          * @see org.eclipse.core.runtime.jobs.Job#run(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor)
00060          */
00061         @Override
00062         protected IStatus run(IProgressMonitor monitor) {
00063                 ATLrunConfiguration config;
00064                 int activitiesTotal = 2;
00065                 int scale = 100;
00066                 
00067                 plugin.log("started job", Status.INFO);
00068                 try {
00069                         monitor.beginTask("Converting", activitiesTotal*scale);
00070 
00071                         if (monitor.isCanceled()) return Status.CANCEL_STATUS;                  
00072                         monitor.subTask("Configure transformation");
00073                         config = this.configureTransformation();
00074                         monitor.worked(1*scale);
00075                         plugin.log("ATL configuration ready", Status.INFO);
00076                         
00077                         if (monitor.isCanceled()) return Status.CANCEL_STATUS;
00078                         monitor.subTask("Run transformation");
00079                         ATLrunner.with( config );               
00080                         monitor.worked(1*scale);
00081                         plugin.log("ATL run done", Status.INFO);
00082                         
00083                 } catch (Exception e) {
00084                         plugin.log("exception thrown", Status.ERROR, e);
00085                         e.printStackTrace();
00086                         
00087                 } finally {
00088                         monitor.done();
00089                 }
00090                 
00091                 return Status.OK_STATUS;
00092         }
00093 
00094         protected ATLrunConfiguration configureTransformation() throws URInotFound {
00095                 ATLrunConfiguration config = new ATLrunConfiguration( atlSource, atlCompiled );
00096                 addSources(config);
00097                 addDestination(config);
00098                 return config;
00099         }
00100 
00101         abstract void addDestination(ATLrunConfiguration config) throws URInotFound;
00102         abstract void addSources(ATLrunConfiguration config) throws URInotFound;
00103 
00104 }
